0100001100111110 0101001001111100 1 -> sum: 1001010110111011, cout: 0
0001011011100100 1001010101010011 0 -> sum: 1010110000110111, cout: 0
1110111110110111 1110101011011101 1 -> sum: 1101101010010101, cout: 1

0101010101010110 1110101001110111 1 -> sum: 0011111111001110, cout: 1

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
